title: Impact of corporate earnings reports on Ventas Inc stock's price movements

content.text: On July 30, 2021, Ventas Inc reported its Q2 2021 earnings. The company's revenue for the quarter was $894.3 million, beating analysts' expectations of $883.8 million. However, the company's earnings per share (EPS) of $0.67 fell short of the estimated $0.73. Following the earnings report, Ventas Inc stock experienced a decline of 2.8% on the same day.

On April 30, 2021, Ventas Inc announced its Q1 2021 earnings. The company reported revenue of $902 million, surpassing analysts' expectations of $884.7 million. Additionally, Ventas Inc's EPS of $0.68 exceeded the estimated $0.63. Consequently, the company's stock price increased by 6.7% on the day of the earnings release.

Ventas Inc released its Q4 2020 earnings on February 18, 2021. The company's revenue for the quarter was $936.5 million, surpassing analysts' expectations of $924.2 million. However, the company reported an EPS of -$0.48, missing the estimated -$0.40. As a result, the stock price decreased by 2.9% on the day of the earnings announcement.

On October 30, 2020, Ventas Inc reported its Q3 2020 earnings. The company's revenue for the quarter was $827.5 million, missing analysts' expectations of $853.3 million. The company's EPS of -$1.11 was lower than the estimated -$0.75. Consequently, Ventas Inc stock experienced a decline of 1.6% on the day of the earnings report.

Ventas Inc announced its Q2 2020 earnings on July 24, 2020. The company reported revenue of $942.6 million, surpassing analysts' expectations of $887.1 million. Ventas Inc's EPS of $0.10 also exceeded the estimated $0.08. As a result, the company's stock price increased by 3.4% on the day of the earnings release.

On May 8, 2020, Ventas Inc reported its Q1 2020 earnings. The company's revenue for the quarter was $936.4 million, which exceeded analysts' expectations of $932.7 million. However, the company's EPS of $0.26 fell short of the estimated $0.43. Following the earnings report, Ventas Inc stock experienced a decline of 3.7% on the same day.

Ventas Inc released its Q4 2019 earnings on February 14, 2020. The company reported revenue of $972 million, surpassing analysts' expectations of $949.3 million. Additionally, Ventas Inc's EPS of $0.49 exceeded the estimated $0.48. As a result, the company's stock price increased by 7.2% on the day of the earnings announcement.

On October 25, 2019, Ventas Inc reported its Q3 2019 earnings. The company's revenue for the quarter was $949.2 million, slightly missing analysts' expectations of $959.1 million. The company's EPS of $0.48 was in line with the estimated $0.48. Consequently, Ventas Inc stock experienced a minimal change in price on the day of the earnings report.
